<rule id="security-manager-deprecation-00020" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
            	<javaclass references="java.lang.System.{method-name}({*})"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="5" title="The java.lang.System.{method-name} method has been deprecated">
                    <message>
                        The java.lang.System::getSecurityManager and java.lang.System::setSecurityManager methods have been deprecated in Java 17. 
                        See the link for further information.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/411" title="JEP 411: Deprecate the Security Manager for Removal"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="method-name">
                <matches pattern="(getSecurityManager|setSecurityManager)"/>
             </where>
        </rule>
